mapper.select: select PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, SALE_UNITPRICE, IMAGE, Recipe_PDF, Price, Category, kind, REGISTRATION_DAY, Note from product order by PRODUCT_NUMBER desc
select PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, SALE_UNITPRICE, IMAGE, Recipe_PDF, Price, Category, kind, REGISTRATION_DAY, Note from product where PRODUCT_NUMBER = #{productNumber}
mapper.insert: insert into product( PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, SALE_UNITPRICE, IMAGE, Recipe_PDF, Price, Category, kind, REGISTRATION_DAY, Note )values( #{productNumber}, #{productName}, #{saleUnitprice}, #{image}, #{RecipePdf}, #{Price}, #{category}, #{kind}, #{registrationDay}, #{Note} )
mapper.update: update product set PRODUCT_NUMBER, PRODUCT_NAME, SALE_UNITPRICE, IMAGE, Recipe_PDF, Price, Category, kind, REGISTRATION_DAY, Note where PRODUCT_NUMBER = #{productNumber}
